casebody.data:
Gleason, Respondent v. Meyers, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November 10, 1892.) Action by Robert W. Gleason against Frederick Meyers.

Argued before Daly, C. J., and Bookstaver and Pryor, JJ.

A. R. Squier, for appellant. C. F. Wells, for respondent.

No opinion. Order reversed, with costs.
